languages.text: "Если появятся новые — не стоит держать их в себе! Интерес к святости есть добродетель".

traits.locale_text: "Если появятся новые — не стоит держать их в себе! Интерес к святости есть добродетель".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."
languages.original_text: "Если появятся новые — не стоит держать их в себе! Интерес к святости есть добродетель".

traits.locale_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It's a virtue to take an interest in holiness."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It's a virtue to take an interest in holiness."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “如果你还有别的问题要问，无须藏在心里，这并不合适！对神圣之物感兴趣是一种美德。”
languages.original_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."

traits.locale_text: “如果你还有别的问题要问，无须藏在心里，这并不合适！对神圣之物感兴趣是一种美德。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."

languages.text: «Si en algún momento le surgen más, ¡guardárselas sería una imprudencia! Interesarse por lo sagrado es una virtud».
languages.original_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."

traits.locale_text: «Si en algún momento le surgen más, ¡guardárselas sería una imprudencia! Interesarse por lo sagrado es una virtud».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「さらに何かが起こるかもしれない…軽はずみな行動をせぬよう注意するのだな。神聖さに関心を持つことは美徳だ」
languages.original_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."

traits.locale_text: 「さらに何かが起こるかもしれない…軽はずみな行動をせぬよう注意するのだな。神聖さに関心を持つことは美徳だ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Solltet Ihr noch weitere Fragen haben, wäre es unklug, sie für Euch zu behalten! Es ist eine Tugend, sich für Heiligkeit zu interessieren."
languages.original_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."

traits.locale_text: "Solltet Ihr noch weitere Fragen haben, wäre es unklug, sie für Euch zu behalten! Es ist eine Tugend, sich für Heiligkeit zu interessieren."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Si jamais une autre question vous taraudait l'esprit, la garder pour vous serait imprudent ! Il est toujours vertueux de s'intéresser au sacré. »
languages.original_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."

traits.locale_text: « Si jamais une autre question vous taraudait l'esprit, la garder pour vous serait imprudent ! Il est toujours vertueux de s'intéresser au sacré. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Olursa sakın benden esirgemeyesin! Kutsala merak salmak erdemdir."
languages.original_text: "Should any more arise — keeping them to yourself would be imprudent! It is a virtue to take an interest in holiness."

traits.locale_text: "Olursa sakın benden esirgemeyesin! Kutsala merak salmak bir erdemdir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
